attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern,

I write you today on behalf of El Pueblo Unido and ask that you please consider
not raising the fees associated with the application for naturalization. It is already
difficult for many families to raise the funds for one member to become a
naturalized citizen. In families where more than one member has the chance at
naturalization, choices must be made and family members must foresake their
chance due to the inability to make the already steep payment.

Rather than create an additional burden and obstacle for families looking to
become naturalized, we ask that you please re-allocate resources in order to
cover any additional revenue this may create so that the current fair and
manageable fee remains.

Respectfully yours,
El Pueblo Unido
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Esteban Garces
